content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mining and Storage at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- BurnerMiningDrill at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0)
- Furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
- BurnerInserter at position(x=43.5, y=-80.5)
- Chest at position(x=42.5, y=-83.5)
- Chest at position(x=43.5, y=-79.5)
- Chest at position(x=44.5, y=-81.5)
- Chest at position(x=45.5, y=-80.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items
- Ensure the quantity to be extracted is greater than 0
### Errors when extracting from a chest
- Make sure the chest contains the item being extracted
### Errors when using a burner mining drill
- Ensure the drill has enough fuel to operate
- Empty the chest at the drop position to continue mining
### Errors when using a burner inserter
- Ensure the inserter has enough fuel to operate
- Ensure the pickup and drop positions are valid and not occupied by other entities
